Class NetScan

java.lang.Object
  com.cycling74.max.MaxObject
      NetScan

public class NetScan
extends com.cycling74.max.MaxObject

This class retrieves network information from the Manticore through an HTTP communication and generates the corresponding nodes and their GUIs.

Since:
27/06/2014.
Author:
Homere Faivre.

Constructor Detail

NetScan

public NetScan()
Method Detail

bang

public void bang()
A bang signal to the NetScan java internal will trigger several actions : - Retrieval of network info from the local HTTP server. - Reset of the used port list and node GUIs. - Creation of new port list and node GUI according to retrieved network data.

Overrides:
bang in class com.cycling74.max.MaxObject
Since:
27/06/2014.
See Also:
MaxObject.bang().

get_server_info

public void get_server_info()
Retrieves network information from the local HTTP server by sending a GET request to the this.info_server URL.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - in case the HTTP request cannot be made.
Since:
27/06/2014.

debug

public void debug()
Sets the program in debug mode (debug_mode = 1).

Since:
27/06/2014.

getNetInfo

public void getNetInfo()
Posts the network info from the this.nodes field to the Max/MSP console.

Since:
27/06/2014.

parse_json

public net.sf.json.JSONObject[] parse_json(java.lang.String s)
Parses the Network information (String) and returns a JSONObject array containing nodes.

Parameters:
s - Network information as a string.
Returns:
nodes Array of JSONObjects containing the parsed nodes.
Since:
27/06/2014.

create_node_interfaces

public void create_node_interfaces()
Creates the node GUIs and adds them to the this.node_interfaces field. These GUI appear in external patcher windows, while the patcher objects are created within the same patcher, that is to say this.patcher.

Throws:
NullPointerExcption - if the this.nodes object is null.
Since:
27/06/2014.

create_new_ports

public void create_new_ports()
Calls the assign_port() method for each sensor in the this.nodes sensors JSONArray and adds the generated port in the sensor JSONObject.

Since:
27/06/2014 .

unassign_ports

public void unassign_ports()
Unassigns all ports from previous bangs sent to the NetScan object.

Since:
27/06/2014.

assign_port

public int assign_port()
Generates a port number while verifying that it does not exist in the this.used_ports field and then adds it to this field.

Returns:
new assigned port.
Since:
27/06/2014.

generate_random_port

public int generate_random_port(int min,
                                int max)
Generates a port number ranging between a minimum value and a maximum value.

Parameters:
min - the minimum port number.
max - the maximum port number.
Returns:
port number.

27/06/2014.
